description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Sausage Hotpot recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Sausage Hotpot Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g cans Italian cherry tomatoes in tomato sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Cook pasta as per packet instructions. Drain.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add sausages and cook for 8 minutes, turning often, until browned on all sides. Remove from pan and slice. Place into an 8 cup-capacity ovenproof baking dish.
Add onion and capsicum to pan and cook for 8 minutes or until tender. Add to baking dish with pasta, tomatoes, olives and spinach leaves. Cover and bake for 25 minutes.

Meanwhile, combine breadcrumbs, cheeses and parsley in a bowl. Stir in melted butter. Sprinkle breadcrumb mixture over bake and return to oven for 15 minutes or until topping is golden and crisp. Scatter with extra parsley and serve immediately.
